trans-unit.source: Represents a variable-length stream of binary data to be stored in or retrieved from a database.
To obtain an OracleBinary object, call the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetOracleBinary%2A> method.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> structure, setting the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.Value*> property to the contents of the supplied byte array.
The byte array to be stored in the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.Value*> property.
Compares this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary"></xref> object to the supplied object and returns an indication of their relative values.
The object to be compared to this <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> structure.
A signed number indicating the relative values of this <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> structure and the object.
Return Value
Condition
Less than zero
The value of this <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> object is less than the object.
Zero
This <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> object is the same as the object.
Greater than zero
This <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> object is greater than the object.
-or- The object is a null reference.
Concatenates two <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary"></xref> structures to create a new <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> structure.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> structure.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> structure.
An structure with the concatenated values of the x and y parameters.
Compares the supplied object parameter to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary"></xref> object.
The object to be compared.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if object is an instance of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary"></xref> and the two are equal; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Compares two <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary"></xref> structures to determine if they are equal.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> structure.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> structure.

An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are equal or <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are not equal.

If either instance of <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBoolean" name="OracleBoolean" href=""></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary"></xref> structure.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
Compares two <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary"></xref> structures to determine if the first is greater than the second.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> structure.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> structure.

An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the first instance is greater than the second instance, otherwise <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.

If either instance of <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBoolean" name="OracleBoolean" href=""></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Compares two <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary"></xref> structures to determine if the first is greater than or equal to the second.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> structure.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> structure.

An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the first instance is greater than or equal to the second instance, otherwise <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.

If either instance of <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBoolean" name="OracleBoolean" href=""></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary"></xref> structure is null.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> is null, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the single byte from the property located at the position indicated by the integer parameter, index.
If index indicates a position beyond the end of the byte array, an exception is raised.
To avoid raising an `OracleNullValueException`, always check the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.IsNull%2A> property and the `Length` property before reading `this`.
The position of the byte to be retrieved.
The byte located at the position indicated by the integer parameter.
Gets the length in bytes of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.Value*> property.
This property is read-only.
To avoid raising an `OracleNullValueException`, always check the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.IsNull%2A> property before reading the `Length` property.
The length of the binary data in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> property.
Compares two <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary"></xref> structures to determine if the first is less than the second.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> structure.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> structure.

An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the first instance is less than the second instance, otherwise <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.

If either instance of <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBoolean" name="OracleBoolean" href=""></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Compares two <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary"></xref> structures to determine if the first is less than or equal to the second.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> structure.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> structure.

An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the first instance is less than or equal to the second instance, otherwise <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.

If either instance of <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBoolean" name="OracleBoolean" href=""></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Compares two <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary"></xref> structures to determine if they are not equal.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> structure.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> structure.

An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are not equal or <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are equal.

If either instance of <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBoolean" name="OracleBoolean" href=""></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Represents a null value that can be assigned to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.Value*> property of an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary"></xref> structure.
`Null` functions as a constant for the `OracleBinary` structure.
To be added.
Concatenates the two <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary"></xref> parameters to create a new <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> structure.
`x` will appear first in the resulting `OracleBinary`, followed by `y`.
[Visual Basic] In Visual Basic, you can use the operators defined by a class, but you cannot override them or create your own.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> object.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> object.
The concatenated values of the x and y parameters.

Gets the value of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary"></xref> structure.
This property is read-only.
To avoid raising an `OracleNullValueException`, always check the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.IsNull%2A> property before reading the `Value` property.
The value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBinary" name="OracleBinary" href=""></xref> structure.
